infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We need microphone access to make AI-powered voice calls on your behalf
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: We need access to your contacts to identify callers and personalize AI responses
infoPlist.NSPhoneCallHistoryUsageDescription: We need to detect missed calls so our AI can call them back automatically
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Use Face ID to quickly and securely sign in to your account
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Aria uses your location to find nearby businesses, provide local search results, and give you relevant recommendations
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Aria uses your location in the background to proactively suggest nearby services and provide location-aware assistance
